video_prompt: Celestial doves gracefully soar and perch amidst glowing, ascending architecture. Ethereal dust sparkles and clouds subtly shift. Lush foliage sways, revealing blossoming flowers. Light sources dynamically illuminate columns and arches, casting shifting shadows.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical shot of a breathtaking celestial architectural scene: towering, ornate white marble and gold structures with columns and arches, bathed in ethereal light. Vibrant blue sky with glowing clouds and sparkling dust. Ascending light-colored stairs flanked by lush pink, purple, and white flowers and foliage. White dove-like birds in graceful flight. Serene, majestic, otherworldly.
refined_video_prompt: Doves gracefully soar and alight on rising, glowing architecture. Ethereal dust sparkles and drifts; clouds undulate and transform. Lush foliage sways, unfurling blossoms. Light sources pulsate, illuminating columns and arches, casting shifting shadows.
